Name: The Legend of Slime
About the game: The Legend of Slime Become the leader of slime, and play a match-three puzzle game! You will lead the slimes to adventure in a randomly generated world! Set your route, and play the match-three game. The world is scattered with a variety of things. Ancient ruins, quiet lakes, and even the battlefields of gods, are waiting for you. Slimes are able to evolve! Under your leadership, they will become faster, stronger, and smarter! Feature: - The world is randomly generated - So many wonderful encounters - You can evolve, and make yourself a perfect slime - A funny match-three game - Slimes are happy and cute =)
